scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts the Visitation, with the Virgin Mary, dressed in a blue robe and a brown veil, standing and looking down. Facing her, Saint Elizabeth, in a golden gown and white veil, kneels with her hands outstretched towards Mary. They are in an outdoor setting with lush green foliage and a prominent rocky outcrop behind them. In the background, a town with buildings and a tower is visible, situated near a body of water. The scene is framed by an arched border with decorative elements.
